review: Not very happy with this product. Everything is up to date as far as software goes and I have hardwired it in still buffers anything I stream, and when connected to airplay it slows/stops my internet connection. I'm regretting buying this apple product.
author: Rory

review: BE PREPARED FOR A HEADACHE.  I worked with apple support, my internet service provider, and my router company.  I own a motorola surfboard modem, and a Linksys E1000n router.  After opening the necessary ports on the router as recommended by apple support (https://support.apple.com/en-us/ht201733) the device still would not connect to the internet.  If you have this combination of equipment be warned that this might not work for you.
author: Tony Gregg

review: I have a TV  and BlueRay Player that can access Netflix and other applications.  I found that this device works much better and streams faster than  both of them.
